bfjvm.desc: I wanted to learn Rust, I am a Windows user, I love CLI tools but I dislike GitBash a lot (it is terribly slow). I wanted something similar to sdkman but compatible with windows and with good performance. Thus I made this project.
bfjvm.title: BF-J-VM

digitalpiano.desc: A simple digital piano. You can interact with it using your keyboard or a touchable screen. This project was made over a rainy week-end using Vite and TS.
digitalpiano.title: Piano digital

javaargparser.desc: This is a solution to an excercise made in few hours. The subject was Make an easy to use CLI argument parser to be used as a library". This is my take on it."
javaargparser.title: Java argument parser

jenkins.desc: Linked to my own Jenkins instance. You can browse inside and check the different projects using the Guest accounrt (Guest/Guest).
jenkins.title: Instance jenkins

mailsenderapp.desc: A simple SpringBoot Java project I made to send emails (it is used by this website in the contact section). I used this projects as an example projects to show how to use DDD and correct testing configuration in a spring boot project.
mailsenderapp.title: Mail sender app

portfolio.desc: This is a reference to this website. Made with Qwik(the brand new framework from the Angular team) and Tailwind.
portfolio.title: Portfolio
